alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Houston; Jones; Monroe; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 9:13AM EST until January 25 at 11:31PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb, Monroe, Jones, Twiggs and Houston Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Macon. * WHEN...From this evening to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor flooding expands. An increasing amount of the Macon GreenWay Ocmulgee Heritage Trail floods north of the Martin Luther King Boulevard bridge. The flood waters will be around one foot deep on portions of the trail and both banks overflow upstream from the bridge. Large portions of agricultural lands well downstream will be under one to three feet of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EST Monday the stage was 15.9 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 19.6 feet Tuesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
